product_name: Dumonde Tech G-10 Bio Green Bike Lubricant - 2 oz.
long_description: G-10 Bio Green bicycle chain lubricant is 100% plant based and 100% biodegradable. Highly concentrated, low-friction film layer keeps components clean and quiet running for long periods of time. Long-lasting formula is designed to penetrate into high-friction areas and resist being washed off. Recommened for both road and mountain bikes.
short_description: G-10 Bio Green bicycle chain lubricant is 100% plant based and 100% biodegradable.
